Description:
(1) you have failed to assess the risk to your employees from use of vibrating machinery, namely hand held tools used in the assembly area (you refer to as Paradise) and elsewhere.
(2 ) you have failed to give effect to appropriate arrangements for the control, monitoring and review of preventative and protective measures, namely the guards on two of your pillar drills, which were absent when I visited.
(3) you have failed to ensure that the exposure of your employees to a substance hazardous to health, namely welding fume, is adequately controlled in that you have failed provide Local Exhaust Ventilation (LEV)or similar engineering controls, for welding operations which causes those operatives not welding, but preparing or finishing welding work who are not required to wear their RPE, to be exposed to welding fume from other bays. Thereby you have not minimised the escape and spread of a substance hazardous to health
